## plotly projects

```{r echo = FALSE, results = "asis"}
projects <- list.dirs(full.names = FALSE)
projects <- projects[nchar(projects) > 1] |> sort()
for (p in projects) {
  glue::glue("* [{name}]({path})", 
             path = p, 
             name = tools::toTitleCase(p)) |>  stringr::str_replace_all('-', ' ')  |> 
    cat()
}

```
